value.name: Family of Ahwatukee man shot, killed by Phoenix police officer still seeking answers one year later
value.description: Ryan Whitaker was shot and killed by a Phoenix police officer. No charges were filed against the officer even though Ryan did nothing wrong.

video.name: Family of Ahwatukee man shot, killed by Phoenix police officer still seeking answers one year later

value.name: Maricopa County attorney won't file charges against officer accused of shooting Ryan Whitaker
value.description: PHOENIX - The Maricopa County Attorney has opted not to file charges in the fatal police shooting of 40-year-old Ryan Whitaker. FOX 10 first reported on the police shooting that killed Whitaker ...

value.name: Phoenix approves civilian review board for police misconduct claims
value.description: Phoenix City Council voted Wednesday to create the Office of Accountability and Transparency for civilian investigations of alleged police misconduct.

video.name: Phoenix approves civilian review board for police misconduct claims

value.name: Phoenix approves civilian oversight office to investigate police misconduct claims
value.description: Phoenix leaders recently voted unanimously to pay out $3 million to the family of Ryan Whitaker, who was fatally shot in the back by police last May. Whitaker's sister, Katie Baeza, asked the City ...

value.name: 'Full accountability for everyone': Legal community applauds verdict in Minnesota trial of Derek Chauvin
value.description: Ryan Whitaker was shot and killed by Phoenix police in May. Maricopa County Sheriff Paul Penzone said law enforcement must represent equality and justice. Communities deserve better, he said. “

value.name: Lancaster to graduate more than 290 on Friday
value.description: Lancaster High School will award diplomas to 295 graduates at commencement exercises at 7:30 p.m. Friday at Lancaster Memorial Stadium. Valedictorian William Robert Anderson, son of Kyle Anderson ...
